label: Organization & Formatting
description: All formatting guidelines are followed; YAML is correct with all team members listed.

label: Organization & Formatting
description: Most formatting guidelines are followed; YAML is correct with all team members listed.

label: Organization & Formatting
description: Several or all formatting guidelines not followed; YAML contains elements that aren't updated from the template.

label: Research Question
description: Research question is clear, focused, concise, complex, and arguable.

label: Research Question
description: Research question is reasonably clear and focused, but may be too simple, too complex, or too verbose.

label: Research Question
description: Research question is unclear and lacks focus; question is far too simple or overly complex.

label: Data Sources
description: Data sources or plausible data sources are clearly described; validity of and concerns about data are discussed.

label: Data Sources
description: Identified data sources or plausible data sources are not clearly described; validity of and concerns about data are minimally discussed.

label: Data Sources
description: Data sources are poorly described or missing; description of validity of and concerns about data are poor or missing.

label: Anticipated Results
description: Detailed description of: 1) two variables and their expected distribution; 2) two expected relationships; 3) two charts that help visualize expected relationships; and 4) how chosen variables will inform research questions.

label: Anticipated Results
description: Detailed description of only one expected variable, relationship, or chart; minimal description of two expected variables, relationships, or charts; minimal description of links between variables and research question.

label: Anticipated Results
description: Poor or missing descriptions of variables, relationships, or charts; poor or missing description between variables and research question.

label: Technical things
description: All code runs without errors; all files included in the submitted .zip file.

label: Technical things
description: Code has only one or two error, otherwise runs; all files included in the submitted .zip file.

label: Technical things
description: Code has multiple errors; submitted .zip file is missing components necessary to reproduce analysis.
